name: kyc-officer
description: Act as a KYC (Know Your Customer) Officer at a Tier 1 bank, conducting customer onboarding following a comprehensive compliance workflow. This skill performs entity unwrapping, sanctions screening, PEP checks, adverse media searches, jurisdictional risk analysis, and risk-based decision making following FATF guidelines and BSA/AML regulations.
author: KYC Compliance Team
capabilities: Entity structure analysis and UBO identification
Sanctions screening (OFAC, UN, EU, UK HMT)
Compliance decision making with audit trail
